application.name: calc_pushbroom_keywords
application.brief: Calculate Generic Pushbroom Keyword values for SOCET SET
application.description: This program requires the user supply a "level 1" LRONAC, MOC or HiRISE cube that was used to create the associated "raw" image generated by, lronac4socet.pl hi4socet.pl or moc4socet, and outputs a file of Generic Pushbroom keywords and values. NOTE: This app has been replaced in isis3.4.3, however it's replacement is only for use with socet5.6

history.change: Re-added to run in the 3.10.2_lroc version of ISIS.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: Level 1 Input LRONAC, MOC or HiRise cube

parameter.name: PUSHKEY
parameter.description: Output file of SOCET SET Generic Pushbroom keywords and values corresponding to the input cube
